subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the **LocalStore**.

subMembers.name: flushInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when data changes and the moment these changes are saved in the local storage. Applies only if [immediate] is **false**.

subMembers.name: immediate
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the **LocalStore** saves changes in the local storage immediately.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the name under which data should be saved in the local storage. The `dx-data-localStore-` prefix will be added to the name.

properties.name: LocalStore
properties.description: The **LocalStore** is a store that provides an interface for loading and editing data from HTML Web Storage (also known as window.localStorage) and handling related events.

Methods.name: clear()
Methods.description: Removes data from the local storage.
